meanings.definition: The process of coming to be something or of passing into a state.
meanings.sent1: Her becomings as a skilled artist were evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The becomings of a caterpillar into a butterfly are truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The becomings of a clumsy dancer trying salsa were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The becomings of a seed into a towering tree are a beautiful transformation.
meanings.sent5: The becomings of a student into a teacher are filled with growth and learning.

meanings.definition: The attractive or pleasing appearance of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: His becomings in that elegant suit caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The becomings of the garden after the rain were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The becomings of a messy room after cleaning were satisfying to see.
meanings.sent4: The becomings of a plain cake into a masterpiece amazed the guests.
meanings.sent5: The becomings of a simple painting into a work of art were inspiring.
